Package org.owasp.dependencycheck.ant.logging

Class AntLoggerAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.slf4j.helpers.MarkerIgnoringBase
      • org.owasp.dependencycheck.ant.logging.AntLoggerAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, org.slf4j.Logger
    public class AntLoggerAdapter
extends org.slf4j.helpers.MarkerIgnoringBase
    An instance of Logger which simply calls the log method on the delegate Ant task.
    Author:
    colezlaw
    See Also:
